name: gepper
description: My cpp helper commands and snippets

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint

cpp.gepper.classPath.description: Where the class will be created

cpp.gepper.headerFileTemplate.description:
Content of your created header file. 
Available commands are:
{{*CLASSNAME*}} - entered classname.
{{*CLASSNAMEUPPER*}} - entered classname in upper-case letters.
{{*CLASSNAMELOWER*}} - entered classname in lower-case letters.
{{*CLASSNAMELOWER*}} - entered classname in lower-case letters.
{{*CLASSNAMECAPI*}} - default classname with capitalized first letter.
{{*HEADERFILENAME*}} - default headerfilename as entered in the settings. 
{{*SOURCEFILENAME*}} - default sourcefilename as entered in the settings.
